title: Harry Potter Cuff Beanie: The Beanie Features tie Dyed Rib Knit with Raised Embroidered Logo. Multi
features: QUALITY MATERIALS: We are focused on bringing you the highest-quality authentic winter wear. Both the hat and scarf are 100% acrylic 4GG knit yarn. The soft hand feel makes this set comfortable while keeping you toasty warm during the fall and winter months
HARRY POTTER BEANIE FOR ADULTS & KIDS: Tested for kids ages 3+, sized to fit most kids and adults.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Hand wash cold with like color, only non-chlorine bleach when needed, lay flat to dry, do not iron.

PERFECT GIFT IDEA:  This beanie makes a great gift for Christmas, Halloween, Birthdays, or any other special occasion.  Whether you are wearing this for a cosplay outfit, a Halloween costume or everyday use, it’s a must have for any Wizarding World fan!
OFFICIALLY LICENSED: 100% officially licensed Harry Potter product.
description: HARRY POTTER CUFF BEANIE: The beanie features tie dyed rib knit with raised embroidered Harry Potter logo.
